page.shortlink: api client api a5 panellayout collapseflow method

argument.name: panel
argument.description: The name of the panel to collapse the flow at.

argument.name: animation
argument.description: Whether or not to animate the panel layout transition. The default value is true.

page.description: Collapse all the panels before the passed in panel, so that the passed in panel is the first panel visible in the layout.
page.example: // assume pObj is a pointer to a panel class pObj.hideDock();
